mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.actual_online_operation_time AS "actualOnlineOperationTime", a.operation_certificate_expire_date AS "operationCertificateExpireDate", a.operation_certificate_issue_date AS "operationCertificateIssueDate", a.operation_certificate_num AS "operationCertificateNum", a.engine_num AS "engineNum", a.frame_num AS "frameNum", a.vehicle_production_date AS "vehicleProductionDate", a.taximeter_num AS "taximeterNum", a.vehicle_type AS "vehicleType", a.name AS "name", a.new_vehicle_num AS "newVehicleNum", a.ori_vehicle_num AS "oriVehicleNum"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM z_resp_vehicle_info a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.new_vehicle_num LIKE '%'||#{newVehicleNum}||'%' '%'+#{newVehicleNum}+'%' concat('%',#{newVehicleNum},'%')
AND a.ori_vehicle_num LIKE '%'||#{oriVehicleNum}||'%' '%'+#{oriVehicleNum}+'%' concat('%',#{oriVehicleNum},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO z_resp_vehicle_info( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks, actual_online_operation_time, operation_certificate_expire_date, operation_certificate_issue_date, operation_certificate_num, engine_num, frame_num, vehicle_production_date, taximeter_num, vehicle_type, name, new_vehicle_num, ori_vehicle_num ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{actualOnlineOperationTime}, #{operationCertificateExpireDate}, #{operationCertificateIssueDate}, #{operationCertificateNum}, #{engineNum}, #{frameNum}, #{vehicleProductionDate}, #{taximeterNum}, #{vehicleType}, #{name}, #{newVehicleNum}, #{oriVehicleNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE z_resp_vehicle_info SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, actual_online_operation_time = #{actualOnlineOperationTime}, operation_certificate_expire_date = #{operationCertificateExpireDate}, operation_certificate_issue_date = #{operationCertificateIssueDate}, operation_certificate_num = #{operationCertificateNum}, engine_num = #{engineNum}, frame_num = #{frameNum}, vehicle_production_date = #{vehicleProductionDate}, taximeter_num = #{taximeterNum}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType}, name = #{name}, new_vehicle_num = #{newVehicleNum}, ori_vehicle_num = #{oriVehicleNum} WHERE id = #{id}
